description: The owners' professionalism and passion go hand in hand with a cuisine made with first - class products. The dishes are simply prepared but tasty, exalting the flavour of the ingredients. It is located in a pretty, refurbished farmhouse on the road that Matilda of Canossa once travelled on.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Wheelchair access']
